<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Change Load Balancer</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/lbaas-load-balancers/{load-balancer_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Change specific load balancer identified by its unique ID.
